name: .TCP File Extension
summary: Learn about .TCP files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Program compiled with Tally.Developer, a Tally Definition Language (TDL) programming environment; contains a program that can be run within Tally.ERP; also contains product information included by the developers.

content: TCP files are used to store custom Tally.ERP applications. They are only readable by Tally products.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
